entries.claim_text: Chile's Atacama lithium operations face 3 active water-rights lawsuits that could curtail output by up to 30% between 2027-2029.

source.title: Reuters: Chilean courts order Atacama lithium review
source.excerpt: Three separate indigenous water rights suits could force SQM and Albemarle to reduce pumping by 25-30%...

entries.notes: Cross-referenced with S&P Global Commodity Insights Q4 2025 report.

entries.claim_text: China controls approximately 68% of global lithium refining capacity as of 2025, a figure that has increased from 58% in 2020.

source.title: IEA Critical Minerals Data Explorer 2025
source.excerpt: China's share of lithium hydroxide refining capacity: 68.3% (2025 estimate), up from 58.1% in 2020.

entries.notes: IEA dataset verified against BloombergNEF Feb 2026 update.

entries.claim_text: Average lithium carbonate equivalent (LCE) grade at Greenbushes (world's largest hard-rock deposit) has declined ~12% since 2019 as high-grade zones are exhausted.

source.title: Inference from Albemarle & IGO annual report trends
source.excerpt: Published ore grades in successive annual reports suggest grade decline; no direct disclosure of 12% figure.

entries.notes: Inferred from published ore grade tables. Treat as directional, not precise.

entries.claim_text: Major automotive OEMs have financial incentives to understate supply risk in investor communications to protect capex commitments and stock valuations.

source.title: Structural incentive analysis
source.excerpt: Analysis of disclosed risk factors vs. analyst briefings suggests systematic downplaying.

entries.notes: Based on comparative analysis of 10-K risk sections vs. earnings call transcripts.

entries.claim_text: A 12-18 month supply shock would delay Western EV sales targets by 18-24 months, adding $800–$1,200 to average battery pack costs.

source.title: Scenario modeling based on BloombergNEF price elasticity data
source.excerpt: Price shock modeling using 2021–2022 lithium spike as analog.

entries.notes: High uncertainty range. Treat as illustrative scenario, not forecast.
